resources.string: Allow this user to add limits for itself

This is mainly useful for the self limitation. It allows the user to add some limits without signing in as parent: 
- adding time limit rules 
- creating categories 
- enabling the notification filter for a category 
- setting a parent category as long as the category is moved downwards in the category hierarchy 
- adding Apps to categories if they are moved to a child category of their current category or if they are not part of any category and the target category is a child category of the category for not assigned Apps 
- block categories temporarily/ extend temporarily blocking of categories
Some options are unavailable because no parent user is signed in
